description:
Dry your boots, shoes, gloves or mitts in no time with this compact forced air-drying system. The Force Dry steps up your accessory drying game its fan driven warm air system. The powerful convection drying process can dry 2 items in as little as 1-hour. An integrated 3-hour timer allows you to have your gear prewarmed and ready to go when you are.

  • Average drying time is 1-2 hours, meaning you could have dry boots, cleats, skates, gloves, etc. over a lunch hour
  • Internal fan circulates warm air throughout your footwear
  • Integrated timer (up to 3-hours) lets you have your gear prewarmed for a specific time
  • Rotating drying arms accommodate a variety of boots and shoes, and fold flat for easy storage
  • Extendable drying arms reach deep into taller boots
  • Maximum temperature is 40.5° C
  • Dimensions: 22 x 27 x 11cm
name: DryGuy Force Dry Shoe  & Glove Dryer
